metadata.title: CVE-2024-45590 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Undergoing Certification (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: body-parser is Node.js body parsing middleware. body-parser <1.20.3 isvulnerable to denial of service when url encoding is enabled. A maliciousactor using a specially crafted payload could flood the server with a largenumber of requests, resulting in denial of service. This issue is patchedin 1.20.3.

criterions.comment: node-body-parser package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
